title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2854/89 of 22 September 1989 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on aluminium chloride falling within CN code 2827 32 00 originating in India to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 4257/88 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2854/89
of 22 September 1989
re-establishing the levying of customs duties on aluminium chloride falling within CN code 2827 32 00 originating in India to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 4257/88 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 26 September 1989, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 4257/88, shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products originating in India:
1.2 //  //  // CN code   // Description  //  //  // 2827 32 00   // Aluminium chloride   //    //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 September 1989.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 375, 31. 12. 1988, p. 1.
